title: Just Started Playing again Account does not have previously purchased items
body: It is all in the title I just re downloaded game and logged into account and I am missing runes, champions, and skins that I know I have previously purchased.  Any information I can get into this would be great thank you.

replies.body: Purchase history only shows the last 90 days, but it's also possible that you may have logged into the wrong account.  No worries, we can find out for sure and help out with recover & reparations if needed.  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team will help directly.  Hang tight!
